DOC.brief_summary: The investigator primary objective evaluate effect 6 month ( 3 days/wk ) supervise , progressive RT program increase daily milk intake untrained adolescent measure body composition cardiovascular risk factor . The investigator hypothesize milk supplementation produce significantly great favorable change body composition measure compare RT + carbohydrate control .
DOC.brief_title: Resistance Training With Milk Supplementation Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: We recruit 150 healthy , adolescent middle school boy girl ( grade 7 9 ) , BMI > 50th percentile < 98th percentile , participate 6 month supervise resistance training ( 3 days/wk ) randomize one 3 group : RT + milk , RT + isocaloric carbohydrate , RT ( control ) . Both physical activity diet outside study protocol carefully monitor . Measurements complete baseline 3 month upon completion training protocol 6 month .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Middle school student ( Grades 79 ) 2 . BMI > 50th percentile < 98th percentile 3 . No resistance training past 6 month . 4 . Endurance training ( run , cycling , swimming , walk exercise etc ) 3 hr per week , assess screen questionnaire . 5 . Weight stable ( +/ 4.5kg ) 3 month prior intake . 6 . Willing randomize one 3 study group . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Individuals contraindication base review health history investigator , include blood pressure , lipid profile , glucose , insulin , abnormal value obtain 24 item blood panel , electrolytes , liver function , etc . These individual refer primary care physician evaluation obtain permission participate . The following cutpoints use cardiovascular metabolic parameter : dyslipidemia lipid ( cholesterol > 240 mg/L ; triglyceride > 500 mg/L ) , hypertension systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHG diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHG , diabetes fast glucose venous plasma fast glucose > 126 mg/dL . 2 . Medications could affect metabolism cardiac drug , thyroid , steroid , insulin , beta blocker , SSRI 's , birth control pill , etc . 3 . Current use smoking/tobacco product initiation smoking/tobacco study . 4 . Eating disorder determine screen questionnaire 5 . Adherence specialize diet regime , vegetarian , macrobiotic , etc . 6 . Food allergy , particularly lactose intolerance . 7 . Treatment psychiatric illness chemical dependency within previous 6 month . 8 . Pregnancy lactation . 9 . Dietary intake ≤800 mg calcium ≤1 serving milk per day assess 3 24 hr diet recall ( 2 weekday , 1 weekend day ) conduct baseline .
